title: Fra Diavolo Sauce With Pasta
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '6 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 5/8 pounds whole peeled tomatoes with liquid, chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '450 g linguine pasta', '8 oz fresh small prawns. peeled and deveined', '8 oz sea scallops', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
